|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE5507L;;3; |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/23/2010 |estreldate = 2011 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00881PHO2 |asin_country = US |asin2 = B009B5A0F0 |asin_country2 = US |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This module is used in the.. *[http://www.techrepublic.com/photos/cracking-open-the-27-apple-imac-2011/6237041?seq=45 ''Apple'' iMac, 2011 27"] :7C:C3:A1 OUI :P/N: 607-7211-A / 607-7212-A [http://blog.ich8.com/post/4893 ''Apple'' on '''ich8''' blogs] :WLAN: [[Atheros]] AR9388 (3T3R 802.11abgn), PA: 3x ''SiGe'' SE5507L :"250-01927-30" and "1101" (01/2011) is silkscreened on the board in the photos. ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Qualcomm Atheros AR93xx 
        Wireless Network Adapter [168c:0030] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Apple Inc. AirPort Extreme [106b:009a]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (64-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=128K]
        [virtual] Expansion ROM at f0400000 [disabled] [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 2
        Capabilities: [50] MSI: Enable- Count=1/4 Maskable+ 64bit+
        Capabilities: [70] Express Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [140] Virtual Channel
        Capabilities: [300] Device Serial Number 00-00-00-00-00-00-00-00
        Kernel driver in use: ath9k
===ath9k info dump=== 
ath9k 0000:05:00.0: enabling device (0000 -> 0002)
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x65
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: 00
ath: Regpair used: 0x65
ieee80211 phy8: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
ieee80211 phy8: Atheros AR9300 Rev:3 mem=0xffffc90019940000, irq=19
===cat /sys/kernel/debug/ieee80211/.../ath9k/base_eeprom=== 
mTOR ath9k # cat base_eeprom 
      EEPROM Version :          2
          RegDomain1 :        101
          RegDomain2 :         31
             TX Mask :          7
             RX Mask :          7
          Allow 5GHz :          1
          Allow 2GHz :          1

   Disable 5Ghz HT40 :          0

           BT option :          0
          Device Cap :          0
         Device Type :          5
  Power Table Offset :          0
        Tuning Caps1 :          0
        Tuning Caps2 :          0
 Enable Tx Temp Comp :          1
 Enable Tx Volt Comp :          0
   Enable fast clock :          1
     Enable doubling :          1
  Internal regulator :          0
        Enable Paprd :          0
     Driver Strength :          0
          Quick Drop :          0
   Chain mask Reduce :          0
   Write enable Gpio :          6
   WLAN Disable Gpio :          0
       WLAN LED Gpio :          8
 Rx Band Select Gpio :        255
             Tx Gain :          0
             Rx Gain :          0
              SW Reg :          0
          MacAddress : 20:c9:d0:36:4c:1b
